title: Join in the Riot Impact Challenge

replies.body: how do i redeem the icon? how do work??{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
how many days you were waiting?
A month so far, still waiting for the mail
If you haven't received your icon code yet, please submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support, and they can resolve this issue for you.
Are these non-profit orgs in Australia? Just looking at the last one makes me wonder why we don't have our own is all....

I don't know if we have something exactly like Mental Health America, but I know here in NSW we've got Black Dog Institute, which started off as a support system for depression but has now also expanded into bipolar, youth suicide, etc.
Pretty sure Black Dog operates in Queensland too, they've run some events up here

And the other regions call OCE shit, maybe so, but at least we had a charity event that they didn't.
